To build a Q&A bot that can answer local files, you can follow these steps:
(1)a question-and-answer dataset (2)Choose a machine learning model–>bert-base-nli-mean-tokens
# 讀取數據集# df = pd.read_csv('chatbot_data.csv') df = pd.read_csv('chatbot_data.csv', encoding='utf-8')#print(df.shape)print(df)# 獲取預訓練BERT模型來生成句向量model = SentenceTransformer('bert-base-nli-mean-tokens') (3)Training model and save model
# 對訓練集生成句子向量 corpus_embeddings = model.encode(df['Questions'])# pickle保存模型with open('chatbot_model.pkl', 'wb') as f:pickle.dump((model, df), f) (4)get the answer
def get_answer(query):# 對查詢生成向量query_vec = model.encode([query])# 計算相似度sim_scores = cosine_similarity(query_vec, corpus_embeddings)# 取最相似的下標index = sim_scores.argmax()return df['Answers'].iloc[index]
title: Build a Q&A bot that can answer local files.
